languages.text: {n}Идира резко кренит голову набок и, впившись ногтями в плечо, бормочет.{/n} "Распутье — две тропы, обе пропитаны кровью, но в конце обеих проклятое око. Тут в моде маски, но скверные, сами спадут от малейшего шороха — за одной слепец, за второй предатель".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира резко кренит голову набок и, впившись ногтями в плечо, бормочет.{/n} "Распутье — две тропы, обе пропитаны кровью, но в конце обеих проклятое око. Тут в моде маски, но скверные, сами спадут от малейшего шороха — за одной слепец, за второй предатель".

languages.text: {n}Idira suddenly cocks her head and drives her nails deep into her shoulder. Then she starts mumbling.{/n} "The crossroads! There are two paths, both stained with blood, both leading to the accursed eye. They all wear masks, so poor and flimsy, they fall at the slightest touch, one hiding a blind man, another a traitor."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира резко кренит голову набок и, впившись ногтями в плечо, бормочет.{/n} "Распутье — две тропы, обе пропитаны кровью, но в конце обеих проклятое око. Тут в моде маски, но скверные, сами спадут от малейшего шороха — за одной слепец, за второй предатель".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira suddenly cocks her head, drives nails deep into her shoulder and starts mumbling.{/n} "The crossroads! There are two paths, both stained with blood and ending with an unblessed eye. They all wear masks, so poor and flimsy they fall at the slightest touch, one hiding a blind man, another a traitor."

There are two paths, both stained with blood, both leading to the accursed eye. They all wear masks, so poor and flimsy, they fall at the slightest touch, one hiding a blind man, another a traitor."

There are two paths, both stained with blood, both leading to the accursed eye. They all wear masks, so poor and flimsy, they fall at the slightest touch, one hiding a blind man, another a traitor."

languages.text: {n}Idira ladea la cabeza y clava profundamente las uñas en su hombro. Luego empieza a murmurar.{/n} «¡La intersección! Hay dos caminos, ambos manchados de sangre, ambos llevan al ojo maldito. Todos llevan máscaras, son pobres y endebles, caen con solo tocarlas, una esconde a un hombre ciego, otra a un traidor».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly cocks her head and drives her nails deep into her shoulder. Then she starts mumbling.{/n} "The crossroads! There are two paths, both stained with blood, both leading to the accursed eye. They all wear masks, so poor and flimsy, they fall at the slightest touch, one hiding a blind man, another a traitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira ladea la cabeza y clava profundamente las uñas en su hombro. Luego empieza a murmurar.{/n} «¡La intersección! Hay dos caminos, ambos manchados de sangre, ambos llevan al ojo maldito. Todos llevan máscaras, son pobres y endebles, caen con solo tocarlas, una esconde a un hombre ciego, otra a un traidor».

languages.text: {n}Idira neigt plötzlich den Kopf und gräbt ihre Nägel tief in die eigene Schulter. Dann beginnt sie zu murmeln.{/n} "Die Kreuzung! Es gibt zwei Pfade, beide mit Blut getränkt, beide zum verfluchten Auge führend. Sie alle tragen Masken, so billig und dünn, sie fallen bei der leichtesten Berührung hinunter, eine verbirgt einen blinden Mann, eine einen Verräter."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly cocks her head and drives her nails deep into her shoulder. Then she starts mumbling.{/n} "The crossroads! There are two paths, both stained with blood, both leading to the accursed eye. They all wear masks, so poor and flimsy, they fall at the slightest touch, one hiding a blind man, another a traitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira neigt plötzlich den Kopf und gräbt ihre Nägel tief in die eigene Schulter. Dann beginnt sie zu murmeln.{/n} "Die Kreuzung! Es gibt zwei Pfade, beide mit Blut getränkt, beide zum verfluchten Auge führend. Sie alle tragen Masken, so billig und dünn, sie fallen bei der leichtesten Berührung hinunter, eine verbirgt einen blinden Mann, eine einen Verräter."

languages.text: {n}Soudain, Idira penche la tête et enfonce ses ongles profondément dans son épaule, puis se met à marmonner.{/n} « Le croisement ! Il y a deux chemins, les deux sont tachés de sang, les deux mènent à l'œil maudit... Tous portent des masques, si fins et fragiles qu'ils tombent au moindre frôlement, l'un cache un aveugle, l'autre un traître. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly cocks her head and drives her nails deep into her shoulder. Then she starts mumbling.{/n} "The crossroads! There are two paths, both stained with blood, both leading to the accursed eye. They all wear masks, so poor and flimsy, they fall at the slightest touch, one hiding a blind man, another a traitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, Idira penche la tête et enfonce ses ongles profondément dans son épaule, puis se met à marmonner.{/n} « Le croisement ! Il y a deux chemins, les deux sont tachés de sang, les deux mènent à l'œil maudit... Tous portent des masques, si fins et fragiles qu'ils tombent au moindre frôlement, l'un cache un aveugle, l'autre un traître. »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉突然扭过了头，指甲深深地刺入自己的肩膀，随后开始喃喃自语起来。{/n}“我看到了十字路口！有两条道路，每条道路都沾满了鲜血，通向被诅咒的眼睛。两个人都戴着面具，脆弱不堪，只要轻轻一碰就会掉下来。一个面具后面藏着瞎子，而另一个后面，藏着叛徒。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly cocks her head and drives her nails deep into her shoulder. Then she starts mumbling.{/n} "The crossroads! There are two paths, both stained with blood, both leading to the accursed eye. They all wear masks, so poor and flimsy, they fall at the slightest touch, one hiding a blind man, another a traitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉突然扭过了头，指甲深深地刺入自己的肩膀，随后开始喃喃自语起来。{/n}“我看到了十字路口！有两条道路，每条道路都沾满了鲜血，通向被诅咒的眼睛。两个人都戴着面具，脆弱不堪，只要轻轻一碰就会掉下来。一个面具后面藏着瞎子，而另一个后面，藏着叛徒。”

languages.text: {n}イディラは突然首を傾げて、肩に爪を深く食い込ませると、何やらブツブツと呟き始めた。{/n}「分かれ道だわ！道はふたつある。どちらも血で濡れていて、どちらも行き着く先は呪われた目。みんな仮面を被っているけど、とても脆くペラペラで、少し触れただけで落ちてしまう。ひとつは盲目の者を、もうひとつは裏切り者を隠しているわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly cocks her head and drives her nails deep into her shoulder. Then she starts mumbling.{/n} "The crossroads! There are two paths, both stained with blood, both leading to the accursed eye. They all wear masks, so poor and flimsy, they fall at the slightest touch, one hiding a blind man, another a traitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはコテンと首を傾げて、肩に爪を深く食い込ませると、何やらブツブツと呟き始めた。{/n}「分かれ道だわ！道はふたつある。どちらも血で濡れていて、どちらも行き着く先は呪われた目。みんな仮面を被っているけど、とても脆くペラペラで、少し触れただけで落ちてしまう。ひとつは盲目の者を、もうひとつは裏切り者を隠しているわ」

languages.text: {n}İdira birden başını kaldırıp tırnaklarını kendi omzuna geçiriyor ve sayıklamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Kavşaktayız! İki yol uzanıyor. İkisi de kanla lekelenmiş. İkisi de lanetli göze çıkıyor. Dokunsan dağılacak, uyduruk maskelerin ardında. Birini hain takmış... Ötekisini âmâ."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly cocks her head and drives her nails deep into her shoulder. Then she starts mumbling.{/n} "The crossroads! There are two paths, both stained with blood, both leading to the accursed eye. They all wear masks, so poor and flimsy, they fall at the slightest touch, one hiding a blind man, another a traitor."
